payload.sql:
SELECT c.relname
            FROM pg_class c
            LEFT JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
            WHERE c.relkind IN ('r', 'v','m') -- (r)elation/table, (v)iew, (m)aterialized view
            AND n.nspname = ANY (current_schemas(false))
payload.name: SCHEMA

payload.sql:
WITH pk_constraint AS (
  SELECT conrelid, unnest(conkey) AS connum FROM pg_constraint
  WHERE contype = 'p'
    AND conrelid = '"administrators"'::regclass
), cons AS (
  SELECT conrelid, connum, row_number() OVER() AS rownum FROM pk_constraint
)
SELECT attr.attname FROM pg_attribute attr
INNER JOIN cons ON attr.attrelid = cons.conrelid AND attr.attnum = cons.connum
ORDER BY cons.rownum
payload.name: SCHEMA

payload.sql:
SELECT a.attname, format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod),
                     pg_get_expr(d.adbin, d.adrelid), a.attnotnull, a.atttypid, a.atttypmod,
             (SELECT c.collname FROM pg_collation c, pg_type t
               WHERE c.oid = a.attcollation AND t.oid = a.atttypid AND a.attcollation <> t.typcollation),
                     col_description(a.attrelid, a.attnum) AS comment
                FROM pg_attribute a LEFT JOIN pg_attrdef d
                  ON a.attrelid = d.adrelid AND a.attnum = d.adnum
               WHERE a.attrelid = '"administrators"'::regclass
                 AND a.attnum > 0 AND NOT a.attisdropped
               ORDER BY a.attnum
payload.name: SCHEMA

payload.sql: SELECT  "administrators".* FROM "administrators" WHERE "administrators"."id" = $1 ORDER BY "administrators"."id" ASC LIMIT $2
payload.name: Administrator Load

payload.sql: SELECT  "posts".* FROM "posts" WHERE "posts"."slug" = $1 ORDER BY "posts"."id" ASC LIMIT $2
payload.name: Post Load

payload.sql: SELECT  1 AS one FROM "posts" WHERE "posts"."slug" = $1 AND ("posts"."id" != $2) LIMIT $3
payload.name: Post Exists
